title: LeBron, Davis reunited -- as All-Star teammates
description: LeBron James was the first pick of the new-look 2025 NBA All-Star draft Thursday night and was soon joined by a now-former teammate -- Anthony Davis.
author: Jamal Collier

title: Ex-Ohtani interpreter gets 57-month sentence
description: Ippei Mizuhara was sentenced to nearly five years in prison for stealing about $17 million from Dodgers superstar Shohei Ohtani to repay gambling debts.
author: Tisha Thompson

title: Was this new low for 'abject' Spurs - and what happened to 'Ange-ball'?
description: Tottenham's loss to Liverpool was described as "abject", "damaging" and "a disgrace" - so what next for Ange Postecoglou and Spurs?

title: It's only special if you win things, says Slot
description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot is delighted to book his first place in an English final - but warns "it's only special if you can win things".

title: Humphries breezes to Premier League win as MVG beats Littler in classic
description: Luke Humphries got his BetMGM Premier League 2025 campaign off to a perfect start with a dominant 6-1 victory over Chris Dobey in the Night One final in Belfast.

title: Shaw withdraws from Man City match squad after racist & misogynistic abuse
description: Khadija 'Bunny' Shaw withdrew from the Manchester City Women squad for Thursday's League Cup semi-final against Arsenal after suffering racist and misogynistic abuse.

title: Deadline doomsday: This year's trades were cold-blooded
description: The trade deadline served as a reminder to fans that the NBA is yet another billion-dollar corporation.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Super Bowl, NFL news, live updates: Will Lamar Jackson or Josh Allen take home NFL MVP?
description: The Super Bowl LIX matchup is officially set: the Philadelphia Eagles will take on the Kansas City Chiefs in New Orleans on Sunday, February 9.
author: Yahoo Sports
